name: Papi Commando Reload Megadrive/Genesis ! Tectoy Version !
name_original: Papi Commando Reload Megadrive/Genesis ! Tectoy Version !
description:
The official TECTOY Demo is available !! :)

Don't wait to play it, defeat the C++ units and the final Boss Zone, Mr Schultz !

Created by Studio Vetea, this Demo allow to play in the Demo Zone only.

Try to get some powerful weapons as the Uzi 9mm, the Desert Eagle, the Cal.12 Shotgun and the awesome Grenades !

How can I get it ??

>> Juste save the civilian on the map ! Touch them. ;)

Can I shoot trough obstacle like the IA ?

>> Sure !! Just stay near of them and shoot ! shoot ! shoot !

Controls :

PAD : Move Papy.

Button A : Fire !

Button B : Pick up Bonus & Food ( Chicken ).

Button C : Split Slot 1 & Slot 2 weapons.

Button START : Pause Game.

============================================

* Graphics,Sound,Music & Code by Vetea.

* All Musics are FM !! Done with DefleMask tracker.

* Default langage : French ( but don't care about ! ^^ )

* Powered with SgdK by Stef.

For a better life, just Play .. Papi Commando !

Have fun !! :D

Vetea
